text: 28.7: Mt 26.32Kamataharɨm narɨ arɨkimbat aŋga uhavuta nuŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ nɨmavamba ambamara, Nu sava humba ha mitata aŋga yahamɨri. Indarɨmara, nuwɨsa kasiramata Galilivu uyɨ, harɨm nuŋ kandɨhambu ŋgɨmandɨra, vamba ambamara. Yi kuyu kandɨnɨ narɨŋ ambavarɨrɨm pan, vami.Gotɨndu kutɨkara naŋga kuyundavaramu
